name: Mouse vs Cats
description:
Game JAM Submission: 8 Bits to Infinity #36 - Mouse Jam 2   Theme: Chase  / Focus : Mouse Only! Diversifiers  One Button - When two buttons are too many.  Quick Run - A casual run of the game takes no more than 5 minutes

Mouse vs Cats is an addictive game of chase, where you are playing a mouse luring cats through the meadows, in an attempt the bring them to the center pasture.  A fast paced, timed experience where slow is smooth and smooth is fast.  

Can you beat you own HighScore?
